mapper.insert: INSERT INTO real_estates (price, is_available, real_estate_description, real_estate_type, metrics, rooms, seller_id, address_id) VALUES (#{realEstate.price}, #{realEstate.isAvailable}, #{realEstate.description}, #{realEstate.realEstateType}, #{realEstate.metrics}, #{realEstate.rooms}, #{clientId}, #{addressId})
mapper.sql: SELECT re.id AS real_estate_id, re.price, re.is_available, re.real_estate_description, re.real_estate_type, re.metrics, re.rooms, a.id, a.country, a.region, a.city, a.street, a.building, a.apartment, c.id AS client_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, c.email, c.phone_number, c.reg_date FROM real_estates re LEFT JOIN addresses a ON re.address_id = a.id LEFT JOIN clients c ON re.seller_id = c.id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM real_estates re WHERE re.id = #{realEstateId}
mapper.update: UPDATE real_estates SET price = #{price}, is_available = #{isAvailable}, real_estate_description = #{description}, real_estate_type = #{realEstateType}, metrics = #{metrics}, rooms = #{rooms} WHERE id = #{id}
